text: The Mayor may issue rules and regulations not inconsistent with the provisions of § 47-2005 or this subchapter or both, in order to properly administer the provisions of § 47-2005 or this subchapter, or both.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
